page.title: 13VISIT TO B&Q
page.content: B&Q is a D.I.Y. store. It sells hardware, furniture, garden accessories and decorative items. It opens from 9.00am to 8.00pm during the week and 10.00am to 6.00pm on Sundays. Usually extra staff are employed on Sundays. the average wage for employees is Â£88.46. The staff comprise 11 full-time workers and 8 part-time. The main store is in Southampton and this is where they decide what items are to to be sold in the other stores. there are over 160 stores in the country. They advertise on television, in the press and through printed booklets. They settled on this site because there was no other store like it in the area.
